actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 6 (1d8+2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12), if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't Constrict another target.
